message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking $200 for it. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thanks for offering! $200 seems a bit steep for me.  Would you consider $80?
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer, but $80 is too low for me.  Could you do $180?
Hi Alice, I appreciate you considering my previous offer. I could go up to $95.  Would that work for you?
Hi Bob, I'm trying to be flexible, but I can't go below $160 for this product. It's really worth it!
